target: Booking was successful.Reference number is : RVSD43KC . what else can i do for you?
context: <user> Hi there, I need to find a hotel - a guesthouse to be precise. I don't need internet so don't worry about that <system> 24 guesthouses fit your criteria. Do you know what side of town you're wanting to be in or the pricerange? <user> Id like a guesthouse rated 3 stars. <system> There are 4 guesthouses that meet your needs, 2 in the north and 1 each in the west and south. Would one of these interest you? <user> I will take the one in the south as long as they have a room for 4 available for 5 nights. <system> I will be happy to make your reservation, what day will you be arriving? <user> book it for 4 people and 5 nights starting from thursday. <system>
